name: Space Warrior ANA 4: The Buried Kingdom
name_original: Space Warrior ANA 4: The Buried Kingdom
description:
Space Warrior ANA and her friends are back with another awesome sequel! Join them in a challenging, yet charming adventure in defeating the evil underground Eclipse Kingdom!

>5 playable characters!

>7 stages full of plenty of enemies to shoot!

>8 unique and fun bosses!

>A catchy and original soundtrack!

>Plenty of cute characters and dialog!

This game contains flashing lights and may not be suitable for those who are sensitive to them.
